nodes.bodyText: .isBlank() will capture cases such as "      "(empty spaces) as well. Do we really need this or just would isEmpty() is suffcient?
Yes, name should never be empty, and since the isBlank internally checks for both isEmpty and space chars, therefore for the safe hand added this.
My argument is will you ever get a symbol name with empty spaces? isBlank internally traverses through the whole char-array where isEmpty only checks char array length == 0.

ParameterInformation model generation is separated from the meta model. SignatureInfoModel is a combination of meta info.
can we move this logic related to setting Tuple.two(paramStart, paramEnd) into getSignatureInfoModel()
Same as the above and it will be better to keep the final model generation in once place. WDYT?

Yeah agree, seems paramStart requires other labelling positions as input.
